Sentencas: Physico-chemical and structural properties of nanocomposite NiO/ZrO2:Y2O3 (NiO/YSZ) films applied using the reactive magnetron deposition technique are studied for application as anodes of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Magnetron formation of Ni/YSZ anodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effect of oxygen consumption and magnetron power on the discharge parameters is determined to find the optimum conditions of reactive deposition.
Titulo: Magnetron formation of Ni/YSZ anodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The conditions for deposition of NiO/YSZ films, under which the deposition rate is maximum (12 mu m/h), are found and the volume content of Ni is within the range of 40-50%.
Titulo: Magnetron formation of Ni/YSZ anodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ni-YSZ films reduced in a hydrogen atmosphere at the temperature of 800A degrees C have a nanoporous structure.
Titulo: Magnetron formation of Ni/YSZ anodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, massive nickel agglomerates are formed in the course of reduction on the film surface; their amount grows at an increase in Ni content in the film.
Titulo: Magnetron formation of Ni/YSZ anodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells with YSZ supporting electrolyte and a LaSrMnO3 cathode are manufactured to study electrochemical properties of NiO/YSZ films.
Titulo: Magnetron formation of Ni/YSZ anodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is shown that fuel cells with a nanocomposite NiO/YSZ anode applied using a magnetron sputtering technique have the maximum power density twice higher than in the case of fuel cells with an anode formed using the high-temperature sintering technique owing to a more developed gas-anode-electrolyte three-phase boundary.
Titulo: Magnetron formation of Ni/YSZ anodes of solid oxide fuel cells
